overview:
Jeffry van de Vuurst has 15 years of experience as a software developer and software architect. He co-founded CWR Mobility BV in January 2006 and as CTO he is responsible for product development in a cross-platform environment using the .NET, Java and iOS development stack.

Jeffry started his career as a software developer at Sogyo, an IT consultancy company, writing business software for clients like IBM and ABN AMRO.

After that Jeffry ran his own business, The Verne, for 6 years, providing technical consultancy and software development services to companies like Avanade and KPN, extending his experience working with Microsoft platform technologies. This is where he first got in touch with mobile software development and he has stayed there ever since.

Jeffry has a passion for software development and mobile technologies, loves gadgets and playing guitar.

Jeffry van de Vuurst holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Administration from the Hogeschool van Utrecht and a Master of Science degree in Cooperative Computing from the Middlesex University in London.
